@template default-docs

h1. Enable Root access on ubuntu over SSH

h3. Create new password for root

{{code: template:shell
passwd root
}}

h3. Enabling root login from ssh config (default is to deny root access)

{{code: template:shell
vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config:
PermitRootLogin yes
}}


h3. Restarting ssh:
{{code: template:shell
service ssh restart
}}
